sub_title: Lawyer in the Netherlands - Founder and CEO at the Dutch Law Institute
summary:
My name is Jan Willem de Groot, and I'm proud to be a co-founder and board member of the Dutch Law Institute, located in Amsterdam, Netherlands. With more than three decades of experience in Dutch contract law, I've become a respected legal authority both locally and internationally. Allow me to share some details about my background and expertise.

I completed both my bachelor's and master's degrees in law at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam, followed by a prestigious fellowship at King's College London. Upon finishing my academic pursuits, I embarked on my legal career at a prominent commercial law firm in Amsterdam, specializing in commercial and civil law cases. From 1985 to 2020, I tackled a variety of high-profile cases involving intricate legal challenges and spanning multiple jurisdictions.

In 2021, I joined forces with a group of esteemed legal professionals to establish the Dutch Law Institute. Our mission was to form an unbiased hub of knowledge and proficiency across diverse legal domains, such as Dutch contract law, employment law, corporate law, and litigation. As the institute's managing director, I am responsible for daily operations and collaborate closely with our team of skilled lawyers to guarantee the highest standard of service.

Throughout my career, my primary focus has been on Dutch and international commercial contracting and liability matters. I have advised and represented clients across numerous sectors, including manufacturing, transportation, and technology. My legal services encompass:

Strategic consultation: Partnering with clients to comprehend their legal requirements and formulate strategies that align with their business goals.
Litigation: Representing clients in court when disputes emerge, safeguarding their interests. I possess extensive experience in civil and commercial litigation, having appeared in almost all Dutch courts.
Arbitration and Mediation: Serving as an arbitrator and mediator in several high-profile disputes, delivering unbiased and efficient resolution services to conflicting parties.

Thank you for taking the time to review my LinkedIn profile. With over 35 years of experience as a legal professional, my dedication to delivering top-quality legal services to clients in the Netherlands and beyond remains steadfast.
